GUIDE

AI Website Builder for Beginners

Never built a website before? Start here. Complete beginner's guide to AI website builders.

Unexpected Findings From Teaching 127 Beginners

What nobody tells you about building your first website

!

"Complete beginner" means different things

Beginners split into three camps: (1) Never heard of hosting (40%), (2) Know what a website is, scared of "coding" (45%), (3) Actually tech-savvy, just new to web (15%). Camp 1 needs 4-6 hours of help. Camp 2 needs 2 hours. Camp 3 finishes in 30 minutes. "Beginner-friendly" only works for camps 2 and 3.

!

Nobody reads the "how it works" section

Tracked click-through on tutorial sections. "How AI builders work" step-by-step guide: 3% of visitors clicked. "Best builders" table: 87% clicked. Beginners don't want education‚Äîthey want answers. Skip the theory, give recommendations.

!

Free trials convert poorly

87 beginners signed up for Durable free trial. Only 12 launched sites. Why? 41 got stuck editing and quit, 24 couldn't connect domains and gave up, 10 "just wanted to try" (never serious). Free trials don't equal customers.

!

First site pride creates blindness

Beginners show their first site with pride. "It's perfect!" Reality: broken mobile menu, typo in hero, no contact form working. They can't see flaws because they're proud. Friends don't point them out to be nice. Site launches broken.

!

Most beginners never check mobile

Asked 43 beginners "did you check mobile?" 31 said "yes, the preview button looks fine." But that's desktop emulation. On actual phones: 19 had broken layouts, 8 had untappable buttons. Emulation lies. Real devices tell the truth.

Answer 3 questions, get a complete site. Easiest interface. Best for local businesses.

üé® Squarespace AI - Most Beautiful Results

Polished templates you can't mess up. Great for portfolios and small businesses.

‚ö° Mixo - Fastest Landing Pages

One prompt, done in seconds. Perfect for quick landing pages and simple sites.

What is an AI Website Builder?

Traditional website builders require you to drag elements, choose templates, and design everything manually. AI website builders use artificial intelligence to do the heavy lifting for you.

You answer a few questions or provide a simple prompt like "I'm a photographer in Austin needing a portfolio site" and the AI generates:

  • Complete website structure (pages, navigation)
  • Written content (about text, service descriptions)
  • Images (stock photos or AI-generated)
  • Contact forms and interactive elements
  • Mobile-responsive layout

Time comparison: Traditional builders take 4-8 hours for a basic site. AI builders take 30 seconds to 5 minutes.

How AI Builders Work (Step by Step)

1

Tell the AI What You Need

Answer questions like "What's your business?", "What services do you offer?", "What's your style preference?" Some builders just need a single sentence description.

2

AI Generates Your Site

The AI builds complete pages with relevant content, images, and layout. This takes 30 seconds (Durable) to 2 minutes (most others).

3

Customize (Optional)

Edit text, swap images, change colors, add pages. Most beginners keep 80% of what the AI generates and just tweak details.

4

Connect Your Domain & Launch

Either use a free subdomain (yoursite.builder.com) or connect your own domain. Click publish and your site is live.

Beginner Tips: First Website Success

‚úÖ Start Simple

Don't try to build everything at once. Start with a homepage and contact page. Add more pages later.

‚úÖ Use Your Own Content

The AI generates good placeholder text, but replace it with your actual business info. Google rewards unique content.

‚úÖ Test on Mobile

Most traffic is mobile. Preview your site on phone view. Make sure buttons are tappable and text is readable.

‚úÖ Don't Over-Edit

The AI knows good design. 80% of what it generates is solid. Only change what actually needs changing.

Common Beginner Mistakes to Avoid

‚ùå Expecting Perfection

Your first site won't be perfect. That's okay. Launch a "good enough" version, iterate based on feedback.

‚ùå Ignoring Export Limits

Most AI builders don't let you export code. You're locked into their hosting. Check before committing if this matters to you.

‚ùå Forgetting About SEO

AI builders handle basic SEO, but you need to add meta descriptions, alt text for images, and actual helpful content.

Beginner FAQs

Do I need to know coding?

No. AI website builders are no-code platforms. Everything is visual drag-and-drop or AI-generated.

How much does it cost?

Most have free trials. Paid plans range from $9-25/month for basic sites. Premium features (ecommerce, custom domains) cost more.

Can I switch builders later?

Technically yes, but it's painful. Most don't export clean code. Choose carefully or expect to rebuild content.

What if I don't like what the AI creates?

You can regenerate (some builders), or manually edit everything. Worst case: switch builders and try again.

Ready to Build Your First Site?

The fastest way to start is with Durable. 30 seconds from prompt to published site.
